alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:58AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Hooker, north central Lincoln, west central Logan, McPherson and southwestern Thomas Counties through 330 AM CDT/230 AM MDT/... At 258 AM CDT/158 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Tryon to 7 miles northeast of Hershey. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tryon, Ringgold, Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Birdwood, Schnick Lake and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 178 and 180. Highway 92 between mile markers 183 and 218. Highway 97 between mile markers 7 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
